avail.title: 5th Revised Ultimate History of Network Radio Programming and Guide to ALL Circulating Shows, The
avail.author: Hickerson, Jay

links.url: /Library Files/T Series/Texaco Star Theater Summer Show/
links.label: Library Files

links.url: /Library Files/F Series/Fred Allen - Texaco Star Theater/
links.label: Library Files

infos.info: According to Dunning, this was a generic title used by the sponsor for several loosely related variety shows. The ones with major stars, though, are usually grouped under those names. Those names, and alternate names, are below: - Fred Allen Show: 1940-44 - The Texaco Summer Theater: 7-12/1943 - Star Theater: 1944-46 - Milton Berle Show: 1948-49

[variously listed as James Melton Show; Summer Theater (thru Sep 10); Star Theater]
